RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlPlayerList

RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlPlayerList Class Reference

#include <xmlplayerlist.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Read the XML file of the Player list.

It provides a blacklist : each player can be placed in this list to tell he can not play anymore. It can be an ultime sanction when I saw the player can't stand the game's rules.

Some notes can be added to a player. A note has a title and a text. This feature is presented like a notepad, the notes can be added, modified and definitively deleted.

It uses TinyXML to deal with the file.

Returns the player list from the xml file.

This function is used by the PlayerList class to get the playerlist. This list is then iterates and we can feed the list of player names.

const char * RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlPlayerList::getXMLTextFromName ( TiXmlElement *  child,
const char *  nodeName 
) [private]

Returns the text element from the child and the given node name.

This function is case sensitive.

Parameters:
child The xml element where we must search the node.
nodeName The node's name we must find in child.
Returns:
The text store in the child's node defined by nodeName. Returns an empty string ("") if none child was found.
